summary: Most requested frontend features appear implemented: updated navigation labels, Services grid with service detail routes + SEO, a functional calculator with assumptions, subsidies page enhancements, a How-It-Works working diagram section, and a reusable Free Consultation CTA with WhatsApp/Call/Form options. The only clearly unverifiable/missing item from the diff summary is the required Hindi infographic image asset under the specified public assets path; the code references it but the diff does not show the asset being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new infographic image asset with Hindi labels under frontend/public/assets/generated and use it for the Grid-Connected Solar System Working Diagram section.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references the PNG at /assets/generated/grid-connected-working-diagram-hindi.dim_1400x900.png, but the diff summary does not show any added file under frontend/public/assets/generated (binary assets may be omitted from the LLM-readable diff).

hallucinated_features.description: Added specific 'Board of Directors' section and named directors with headshot images on the About page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for adding directors, names, or headshots; it only specifies navigation/IA and solar/subsidy/services/calculator/CTA features.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AboutPage: "Board of Directors section with three directors (Vishnu, Kartik, and Ganesh Kumar Chaudhary) displayed with square headshot images")

hallucinated_features.description: Added Branch Office address details (Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh) on the Contact page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding multiple offices/addresses; it only requires CTA routing to existing contact form/flow.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (ContactPage: "both Head Office ... and Branch Office (Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh) addresses")
